title: Day 077 (Deuteronomy 21-23) - Year 4

description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- 2 Corinthians 6:14

- Galatians 3:13

- Numbers 22-24

- Podcast: When Scripture Doesn't Make Sense*
